# Character Wealth by Level (Table)
## Overview
**Table 12–4: Character Wealth by Level**


| **PC Level\*** | **Wealth** |
|---|---|
| 2 | 1,000 gp |
| 3 | 3,000 gp |
| 4 | 6,000 gp |
| 5 | 10,500 gp |
| 6 | 16,000 gp |
| 7 | 23,500 gp |
| 8 | 33,000 gp |
| 9 | 46,000 gp |
| 10 | 62,000 gp |
| 11 | 82,000 gp |
| 12 | 108,000 gp |
| 13 | 140,000 gp |
| 14 | 185,000 gp |
| 15 | 240,000 gp |
| 16 | 315,000 gp |
| 17 | 410,000 gp |
| 18 | 530,000 gp |
| 19 | 685,000 gp |
| 20 | 880,000 gp |

 \* For 1st-level PCs, see table 6–1 in Chapter 6.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 399
